newsitem.title: USA: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Earnings, forecasts.
newsitem.headline: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Earnings, forecasts.

text.p: HCIA INC -- expects second quarter loss due to revenue shortfall at its provider solutions unit. Alex. Brown downgrades to market perform from strong buy. Stock drops 16-1/2 to 15-1/2.
HBO & CO -- posts second quarter earnings of $0.44 a share compared with $0.27 a share on a 25 percent rise in revenue. Up 2-1/4 to 74-7/8.
VIISAGE TECHNOLOGY INC -- sees lower than expected second quarter earnings due to delays in the timing of contract awards for certain projects. Down 2-1/2 to 14.
SPORTS AUTHORITY INC -- sees second quarter earnings below analysts expectations due to negative trends in in-line skates, fitness and outdoor categories. Down 1-5/16 to 19-3/16.

ENRON OIL & GAS CO -- said second quarter net income and net operating revnues were lower than last year's second quarter due to lower gains and proceeds from property sales and other marketing net income. Down 10/16 to 18-15/16.
SRS LABS INC -- sees second quarter earnings, revenues below analysts' expectations due to delays in semiconductor solutions for SRS 3D Sound technology. Down 1-3/8 to 6-3/4.
ASCEND COMMUNICATIONS INC -- Goldman Sachs initiates coverage, adds to recommended list. Up 4-1/8 to 52-1/8.
NETSCAPE COMMUNICATIONS CORP -- Cowen & Co upgrades to strong buy from buy. Up 4-1/2 to 43-3/8.
KATZ MEDIA GROUP INC -- said has been approached by a "number of parties regarding a potential corporate transaction." Up 1-3/8 to nine.

ARVIN INDUSTRIES INC -- posts second quarter earnings of $0.91 a share compared with $0.63 a share last year on an eight percent increase in sales. Sees earnings growth for rest of 1997 to outpace sales. Arvin gains 1-7/8 to 30-3/8.

SEQUENT COMPUTER SYSTEMS INC -- sees second quarter earnings $0.20 to $0.23 a share on revenues of $205 to $210 milion, which includes $36 million from a contract with Boeing Co. Sequent also files for 5.25 million share offering. Up 1-1/16 to 24-13/16.
EATON CORP -- posts second quarter earnings $1.64 a share compared with $1.32 a share on a seven percent increase in sales. Up 1-9/16 to 85-11/16.
INNOVEX INC -- posts third quarter earnings of $0.72 a share compared with $0.25 a share last year. Net sales more than double to $41.9 million. Up 1-7/8 to 30-1/2.
NATIONSBANK CORP -- posts second quarter earnings of $1.02 per diluted share, up from $0.99 a share last year. Up 1-1/4 to 67-7/8.
